description:
Summary score for the Insomnia Severity Index. [Morin (1993)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21532953/) Each item is scored from 0 to 4. Total score is the sum of all seven items (0 to 28), and catergorized as: absence of insomnia (0 to 7), sub-threshold insomnia (8 to 14), moderate insomnia (15 to 21), and severe insomnia (22 to 28).

[Search for all ISI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/answers/variables?search=isi)
